content.d: Kanata-chan, will you grant me my once-in-a-lifetime request?
Eh~, what is it? I’m listening~ I did ask you for something like that, too, didn’t I~?
Dive with me... into the sea at Uchiura!!
Kanata-chan, I want you to see the world under the sea too. It’s so beautiful!
If we swim a lot, I think the nap afterwards will feel extra amazing, don’t you~?
It’s Kanan-chan’s once-in-a-lifetime request after all~! Let’s swim a lot!
